scripts.start: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const agentDir='/root/.openclaw/agents/main'; const publicUrl=(process.env.OPENCLAW_GATEWAY_URL||'').replace(/\/$/, ''); fs.mkdirSync('/tmp/openclaw', { recursive: true }); fs.mkdirSync(path.join(agentDir, 'agent'), { recursive: true }); const config={gateway:{port:parseInt(process.env.PORT||7860,10),bind:'lan',mode:'remote',auth:{token:'growthops'},controlUi:{dangerouslyAllowHostHeaderOriginFallback:true}},channels:{telegram:{enabled:true,botToken:(process.env.TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN||'').trim(),webhookUrl: publicUrl ? publicUrl + '/channels/telegram/webhook' : undefined,dmPolicy:'allowlist',allowFrom:['process.env.MY_TELEGRAM_ID']}},agents:{defaults:{memorySearch:{enabled:false}}},models:{providers:{google:{apiKey:(process.env.GEMINI_API_KEY||'').trim(),baseUrl:'https://generativelanguage.googleapis.com',models:[{id:'gemini-2.0-pro-exp-02-05',name:'Gemini 2.0 Pro'}]}}}}; const auth={profiles:{google:{apiKey:(process.env.GEMINI_API_KEY||'').trim()}}}; fs.writeFileSync('/tmp/openclaw/openclaw.json', JSON.stringify(config)); fs.writeFileSync(path.join(agentDir, 'agent/auth-profiles.json'), JSON.stringify(auth));" && OPENCLAW_CONFIG_PATH=/tmp/openclaw/openclaw.json openclaw gateway run --allow-unconfigured
